name: The 11th International Workshop on Security in e-Science and e-Research
content: The workshop intends to provide a forum for researchers, developers, and users working on security issues associated with e-Science and e-Research to exchange ideas and share experiences. Its emphasis on establishing a state-of-the-art for security in e-Science and e-Research, identifying challenges and discussing solutions for successfully enabling security for e-Science and e-Research. The workshop program will be a blend of presentations of research papers, and discussions about the current status, emergent areas, and trends on security-related issues in e-Science and e-Research.
